title: Personal Information and Modern Identity

sections.title: Personal Data
sections.content:
Essential words for bank forms and identity.

- **Name**: Nombre
- **Surname**: Apellido
- **Address**: Dirección
- **Date of Birth**: Fecha de nacimiento
- **ID Card**: DNI
- **Phone Number**: Número de teléfono
- **Email**: Correo electrónico
- **Signature**: Firma

sections.title: Modern Identity: Biometrics
sections.content:
Today, we don't always use a signature. We use **Biometrics**.

- **Face ID**: Reconocimiento facial
- **Fingerprint**: Huella dactilar
- **Security**: Seguridad
- **Scan**: Escanear

### Identity Flow
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Customer] --> B{Scan}
    B --> C[Face ID]
    B --> D[Fingerprint]
    C --> E[Access Account]
    D --> E
```

sections.title: Questions with 'To Be'
sections.content:
To ask for information, we change the word order.

**Structure: Verb + Subject + ...?**
- **Are you** a customer? (¿Eres cliente?)
- **Is it** your ID card? (¿Es tu DNI?)
- **Is Face ID** secure? (¿Es seguro el Face ID?)

**Short Answers:**
- Yes, **I am**. / No, **I'm not**.
- Yes, **it is**. / No, **it isn't**.

objectives: Complete a basic bank form with personal data
Ask and answer simple questions with the verb 'to be'

keyTerms.definition: Using your body (face, finger) to confirm who you are.
